title: Jordan
summary: Citi has achieved a distinct positioning of being a trusted and leading banking partner in the Jordanian market and is today the only commercial U.S. bank in the country.
tag-2: Citi was first established in Jordan in 1974. Our main branch is located in the Shmeisani area of Amman.
tag-3: Citi has achieved a distinct positioning of being a trusted and leading banking partner in the Jordanian market and is today the only commercial U.S. bank in the country.
tag-14: If you are interested in career opportunities at Citi, please email your CV to hr.jordan@citi.com.
